title: How to set Google Chrome as your default browser on Windows 11
content:
Google Chrome is an extremely powerful web browser. It becomes even more capable once you start adding extensions to make tasks easier and faster. Though, if you’re setting your default browser to Google Chrome on Windows 11, there are a few things to keep in mind.

more…

The post How to set Google Chrome as your default browser on Windows 11 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google Chrome is a fantastic browser that makes using the internet across devices easy. Here's how you can set Google Chrome on Windows 11 as the default browser.
